paymentInfo.title: Payment information
paymentInfo.subtitle: How we handle your payment securely
paymentInfo.paymentProcessingDesc: Payments are processed by Stripe. Your payment information is handled securely by Stripe and is not stored on our servers.
paymentInfo.pciCompliantDesc: Stripe is certified to the highest level of PCI DSS (Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard).
paymentInfo.encryptedConnectionDesc: All data is transmitted over an encrypted SSL/TLS connection.
paymentInfo.paymentMethodsDesc: We support several payment methods through Stripe. Available options may vary by country and device.
paymentInfo.creditDebitCardsDesc: Major card networks such as Visa, Mastercard, and American Express.
paymentInfo.digitalWalletsDesc: Where supported, wallets like Apple Pay, Google Pay, or Link by Stripe.
paymentInfo.localMethodsDesc: In some regions, local payment methods such as bank transfers may be available.
paymentInfo.reviewOrderDesc: You see what you are purchasing and the total amount before entering any payment details.
paymentInfo.enterPaymentDetailsDesc: You enter your card or wallet details in a Stripe-powered payment form using a secure connection.
paymentInfo.confirmPaymentDesc: You review the final amount and confirm the payment. The payment button shows the exact amount that will be charged.
paymentInfo.accessActivatedDesc: After successful payment, you are redirected back to Hopladay and your Premium access is activated automatically.
paymentInfo.pricingDesc: The price shown when you click "Upgrade" is the exact amount that will be charged. Any applicable taxes are included or clearly displayed before you pay. There are no hidden fees.
paymentInfo.paymentQuestionsDesc: If you encounter an issue during checkout or have questions about a charge, contact us and we will help you resolve it.
paymentInfo.refundPolicyDesc: We offer refunds in specific cases, such as technical issues or accidental duplicate charges. Full details are described in our refund policy.
paymentInfo.stripeTrademark: Stripe is a registered trademark of Stripe, Inc. Payments are processed through Stripe's secure infrastructure.

refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.subtitle: Our simple and customer-friendly refund policy
refundPolicy.guaranteeDesc1: Premium is a one-time purchase that gives you lifetime access to all Premium features. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase for any reason, we offer a full refund within 365 days of your purchase—no questions asked.
refundPolicy.guaranteeDesc2: Take your time to explore all Premium features. Simply contact us within 365 days of your purchase, and we'll process a full refund to your original payment method.
refundPolicy.contactUsDesc: Send an email to hello@hopladay.com requesting a refund. Include your account email address.
refundPolicy.processRefundDesc: We'll verify your purchase and process a full refund to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
refundPolicy.refundReceivedDesc: The refund will appear on your original payment method. It may take additional time for your bank or card issuer to reflect the refund.
refundPolicy.eligibilityDesc: To be eligible for a refund:
refundPolicy.eligibility1: Your refund request must be made within 365 days of your original purchase date
refundPolicy.eligibility2: You must provide the email address associated with your account
refundPolicy.eligibility3: No reason required—we trust your judgment
refundPolicy.processingTimeDesc: Once we receive your refund request:
refundPolicy.processingTime1: We'll process your refund within 5-7 business days
refundPolicy.processingTime2: The refund will be issued to your original payment method
refundPolicy.processingTime3: It may take additional time for your bank or card issuer to reflect the refund in your account
refundPolicy.processingTime4: You'll receive an email confirmation once the refund has been processed
refundPolicy.questionsDesc: If you have questions about our refund policy or need assistance with a refund request, please contact us:
